name: Palmetto Regular Warm Weather Sleeping Bag

features:
Temperature rating 5 to 21°C (40 to 60°F)
Adult size 33” x 75”, fits up to 5'11" tall

2 lbs of ThermoTech® insulation

Durable Polyester cover with Brushed Polyester liner

ComfortSmart™ Technology includes: 

- ZipPlow™ zipper provides snag-free opening and closing

- QuickCord™ technology offers no tie patented closure for easy, one-person packing

- ComfortCuff™ surrounds your face with softness while you sleep

- Roll Control™ system keeps your bag straight while rolling it up

Commercial machine washable 

Zip together compatible 

Five year limited warranty
